values.wakanda_banner: Wakanda service helps developers and product owners to collect statistics of their systems and analyze to improve decision making
values.name: Name
values.how_we_works_text: Create your account, register a server and use our APIs to send statistics to us, access our dashboards and see statistics in real-time.
values.why_us_text: It simple, faster config and more it reliable, see your statistics where you want, we have integrations with Google Sheets, Slack, PowerBI and our own Dashboard.
values.like_a_magic_text: We have APIs to integrate statistic on your systems running on AngularJS, Javascript, Java, NodeJS, Python and Webhooks for other languages/technologies.
values.new_features_text: We added Javascript API to help developers using pure javascript to register statistics easier.
values.stay_connected_preferred_control: Stay connected with your preferred control
values.stay_connected_preferred_control_text: Remember, you can see your statistics on Google Sheets, PowerBI and on our own Dashboard.
values.become_a_developer_text: Help us creating your own widgets and share with community, teams that help the community have complete free plans.
values.message_success_create_project: Congratulations, you create a new project, your server its not ready yet, wait few minutes, we are working on that, you will be notified when its finished.
values.message_app_deleted: Ok, your app will be deleted, wait some seconds for him disappear.
values.message_problems_try_again_later: Oops, we're having problems, please try again later.
values.message_project_help_without_projects:
Hi, on this page you will manage your projects, you can have 2 projects for account, if you want more you can upgrade to PRO.

To create a new new project click on plus button on your left.
values.message_how_to_use_api: This fields glowing in yellow are your Api Key and Encrypt Key, the utility libraries will ask you for this fields when you programming the send of statistics, go to Documentation to learn how you use this fields.
